title: Druaga no Tou: The Aegis of Uruk - Jil no Bouken

synonyms: Tower of Druaga: The Aegis of Uruk Alternate First Episode
Tower of Druaga: The Aegis of Uruk Special
alternative_titles.en: Tower of Druaga: The Aegis of Uruk - Jil's Adventure
alternative_titles.ja: ドルアーガの塔 〜the Aegis of URUK〜 「ジルの冒険」

synopsis:
This is a special "back-side" (ura) episode aired on GyaO simultaneously with original broadcast which features the background story from party's side instead of Jil's. 

(Source: AniDB)
